sentence.Network_en: My life was totally different thenceforth.
sentence.Network_cn: 从此，我的生活彻底改变了。

sentence.Network_en: Thenceforth, a serious political contest was altogether out of the question.
sentence.Network_cn: 从此就再谈不上严重的政治斗争了.

sentence.Network_en: Women were given the same rights as men; thenceforth they could vote.
sentence.Network_cn: 妇女被授予男人同样的权力; 从那时起,妇女可以选举了.

list.abs: I feel my life thenceforth begins to become successful , arrive smoothly all the time now ., 我感觉我的人生从那时开始变得顺利 , 一直顺利到现在.

entry.def: Thenceforth means starting from a particular time in the past that you have mentioned.

example.ex: My life was totally different thenceforth.
example.tran: 从此，我的生活彻底改变了。
